com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware

Class SensorDistanceEx.DistanceTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware.SensorDistanceEx.DistanceTarget
  • Enclosing interface:
    SensorDistanceEx

    public static class SensorDistanceEx.DistanceTarget
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a target distance

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistanceTarget(DistanceUnit unit, double target)
      Target must be within the range of the Rev 2m Sensor, which is 2 meters

      DistanceTarget(DistanceUnit unit, double target, double threshold, java.lang.String name)
